Actions.Name: Take The Shot
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range 8 for an off-battlefield sniper. They choose a side of the battlefield. At the end of that character's turn, if they are not in cover from that side of the battlefield, they must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] on a successful save. The [name] can change the side of the battlefield at the start of their turn. A character can end this mark by moving 5 or more spaces on their turn.
